name: Elemental Warrior (Phoenix Studios)
description:
Plot:

After crash landing on an alien planet, a heroic astronaut must race to collect the four elements of the universe and escape, before the horrifying monsters devour him alive!

(The game automatically saves your progress)

Controls:

Move = A and D

Jump = W

Fire = Left Mouse

Pause = P

Menu Select = Enter, Return

More Info:

Here’s the contact info for the guy who did the music. You guys should check out his other work he’s awesome.

Twitter: @FergusonGuitar
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/user-236541387
